name_japanese: サクラより愛をのせて
description: A short film by Okamoto Tadanari.

name_japanese: さくらんBOY DT
description: The Geisha Tokyo Entertainment company has announced on Wednesday it is producing and airing Sakuran Boy DT, "Japan's first" Flash-animated television series about a local costumed hero character. The name of the character is a wordplay on the Japanese translation for "cherry boy" — the Japanese slang for a male virgin — and the Sakuranbo television station in the northeastern Japanese city of Yamagata. The story revolves around Satou-kun, an ordinary high school boy who transforms into Sakuran Boy DT to rescue the mayor's daughter from the nefarious secret society Zaou. Sakuranbo has posted a trailer online, and the 11 five-minute weekly episodes will premiere on this station on January 14.

name_japanese: サルサ いいな いいね
description: Music video for the song Salsa Ii na Ii ne by Hey! Say! 7, a unit in the Hey! Say! JUMP! Japanese boy band. The animation was done by Creatures, Inc.

name_japanese: サムとチップのハチャメチャ大レース
description:
The Hari Hari Island Adventure Rally is just about to start! Hello Kitty, Keroppi, and other Sanrio favorites have gathered in fantastical cars for an endurance race around the island’s many obstacles. Sam and Chip think their vehicle has what it takes to win the checkered flag, but after a late start and a few unfortunate accidents, can this plucky duo survive the odds and pull off a victory?

(Source: Shiteater Fansubs)

name_japanese: サムちゃんのおばけなんか怖くない
description: It's Halloween and Tuxedo Sam gets scared by ghosts. He tries to overcome his fears with his friends.

name_japanese: 삼총사 타임머신 001
description:

name_japanese: SAMURAI
description: A music video for the Sakamoto Kyouju (サカモト教授) song "Samurai".

name_japanese: サムライダー 謎の転校生
description:
In a combination of samurai movies and Bomber Bikers of Shonan, Tokyo street punk Masao buys a treasured FZR "katana" motorcycle and becomes a knight of the road, attacking criminals with a genuine katana sword.

Based on the manga by Shinichi Sugimura published in Young Magazine.

name_japanese: 三剑豪之半面人
genres: Action, Adventure, Romance, Martial Arts, Fantasy
description: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

name_japanese: 三毛流浪记
description:
San Mao was a very poor orphan. He was wandering in Shanghai where people dreamed of riches in the 1930s. Sanmao, together with his baldheaded friend Xiao Laizi received grain unexpectedly from the entrepreneur Wu Zifu. Later he fell into a coma mysteriously, and the reporter Hou Yiwen would try to investigate the relationship between Wu Zifu and San Mao.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name_japanese: 三太郎 と かぐや姫 の 交通安全
description: A traffic safety anime featuring 3 Tarous (Tarou Urashima, Momotarou, Kintarou) and Kaguya-hime.

name_japanese: 三匹の小熊さん
description: A story of three little bears going on an adventure to find the lost little duck.

name_japanese: 三びきの子ぶたの交通安全
description: A traffic safety anime aimed at infants to lower elementary school aged children. It stars the 3 little pigs and teaches how to walk on roads, use pedestrian crossings, and what road signs mean.

name_japanese: 三丁目の夕日
producers: Group TAC, Mainichi Broadcasting System, Toho
description: Based on the same name slice of life manga by Saigan Ryouhei.

name_japanese: サンドウィッチマン 東北愛ボトル
description: Suntory commercials for their oolong tea bottles featuring Sandwhichman, a comedy duo from Japan. The commercials were shown on television and streamed on Suntroy's official YouTube channel. The theme is Touhoku love, Touhoku is the Northeast region of Japan composed of 6 prefectures. Each commercial focuses on one of the prefectures in that region (respectively Miyagi, Fukushima, Aomori, Yamagata, Iwate, and Akita).

name_japanese: 三国志
description: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

name_japanese: 三国志 第一部 英雄たちの夜明け
description:
The Yellow Turban rebellion that initiated the downfall of the ruling Han dynasty. At the start of the story, both Liu Bei, its eventual protagonist, and Cao Cao, its eventual antagonist, are minor players. Liu Bei is striving to find a way to bring order to a chaotic world. As he puzzles he way toward the correct course of action, he befriends two powerful warriors, Zhang Fei and Guan Yu. Together, they take the Oath of the Peach Garden, to live and die together as warriors for justice. Meanwhile, Cao Cao is pondering how to fulfill his destiny as "a hero in a chaotic world or a villain in a peaceful one."

Initially, power seems to belong to usurping warlord Dong Zhuo and his right-hand man, the hero Lu Bu. But the two soon fall out over a woman, and the resulting power vacuum gives Cao Cao his chance. Even though Lu Bu is the stronger warrior, Cao Cao has the devil's own luck on the battlefield. Liu Bei tries to stick to the right course, but he is just a minor piece on the giant chessboard of China's warring states. War rages up and down the country, with inconclusive result, thus setting the stage for the next two movies in the series.

(Source: Orphan Fansubs)

name_english: Great Conquest Romance of Three Kingdoms
name_japanese: 三国志 第二部 長江燃ゆ!
description: An anime based on the Romance of the Three Kingdoms novel.

name_japanese: 三国志 第三部 遥かなる大地
description: An anime based on the Romance of the Three Kingdoms novel.

name_japanese: 算法少女
description:
An adaptation of a children's novel of the same name published in 1973. Endo Hiroko is the author, who was inspired to write the story from a tale her father told her as a child.

It follows a 13 year old girl named Aki. During a pilgrimage to Sensou-ji (a Buddhist temple located in Asakusa, Tokyo), she found a mistake in the sangaku. News spread quickly of her intellect and eventually landed upon Arima Yoriyuki, the lord of the Kurume Domain (he himself was famous for finding the rational approximation of pi). He hired Aki to become an arithmetic teacher for the region's princess, but hired others as well. In a math competition, Aki fought against other geniuses and prodigies, all for the hopes of earning a wage so that she may one day open a school for poor children so that she can teach them arithmetic as well.

name_japanese: サンリオ・クリスマス・ファンタジア
description: Set to Fantasia-like music, the anime pans over a town during their Christmas celebrations while Santa flies across the sky.

name_japanese: 三三的恶作剧厨房
description:
A "gourmet action movie" that took place in the kitchen, the small alpaca who coveted a variety of delicacies decided to take two good friends to fight. In Sansan’s Kitchen of Pranks, sugar points! Calories! Carbon water... does not exist. A very attractive "Zero Card" Healing Fan will become delicious today!

(Source: official Bilibili, translated)

name_japanese: 算数チャチャチャ
description: Music video explaining solutions to various mathematical problems that aired as part of NHK’s Minna no Uta program.

name_japanese: サンタクロースつかまえた ！
description: A simple story about a young boy who stays up on Christmas in order to catch Santa and show the proof to his older friends.

name_japanese: サンタ・カンパニー ～クリスマスの秘密～
description: A feature-length version of the short anime film Santa Company.

name_japanese: サンタの山 妖精の森
description: A two volume VHS release about Santa Claus. The first volume is about how elves try to keep Santa from moving from the cold North Pole. The second volume is about Santa trying to go on a diet because he's eating too much of Mrs. Clause's delicious food.

name_japanese: サンタさんとトナカイクッピ
description: Santa is having a race to determine the ten reindeer who will pull his sleigh that year. Kuppi is a young reindeer who wants more than anything to pull Santa's sleigh, and he enters the race.

name_japanese: サンタさんは大いそがし
description: A short anime about what Santa does when he's not delivering presents.

name_japanese: さぬき映画祭オープニング映像
description: Sanuki Film Festival in 2015 and 2016 had opening animations to officially launch the beginning of the festival.

name_japanese: 山賊ダイアリー
description:
Bundled with the limited edition sixth volume of the manga. It will be between 10 to 15 minutes long and will adapt the events of the first volume.

(Source: MAL News)

The hero and author of Sanzoku Diary is Okamoto Kentarou. When he was young, he lived out in the country, and he knew an old man who was a hunter. In 2009, Kentarou was inspired to leave Tokyo and return to Okayama Prefecture to become a hunter himself. Using an air rifle and traps, Kentarou hunts, prepares, and eats various animals. The manga covers all his hunting-related activities in close detail. 

(Source: MangaHelpers)

name_japanese: サラ毛ぷっちょ
description: UHA Mikakutou is a candy company that makes a chewy confectionery called Puccho. The candy has mascots and the company collaborated with Ryou Inoue for an anime short with these mascots in a Revolutionary Girl Utena inspired feature. Special LINE stamps were also available in honor of the collaboration.

name_japanese: さらばジャマイカ
description: An uplifting song about the beautiful country of Jamaica.

name_japanese: さらば青春
description: A retrospective of a long journey on a great open highway. The time spent, the people they see, the billboards they gaze upon, and the records the go through.

name_japanese: さらしもの
description: A music video for the song Sarashimono by Gen Hoshino

name_japanese: 劇場版 サルゲッチュ 黄金のピポヘル・ウッキーバトル
description: One day, a strange monkey with a golden helmet drains out the insides of another monkey by kissing him. Hikaru, Spike's brother,  goes out on an adventure to find this strange monkey. He soon befriends the monkeys and runs forward. But it isn't easy when every boss from the former games tries to block his path...

name_japanese: サルゲッチュ ～オンエアー～2nd
genres: Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy, Kids, Romance, Shounen
description: Saru Getchu: On Air sequel.

name_japanese: 猿蟹合戦（予告）
description: An adaptation of the classic Japanese folktale albeit a teaser.

name_japanese: さるカニ合戦 いじめっこザルと正直カニさん
description: An educational animation on the problems of bullying.

name_japanese: サル太郎 ヘルメットはかぶってね
description: Saru Tarou learns about the importance of wearing a helmet while riding bicycles.

name_japanese: サル太郎 地震には負けないぞ！ ～地震への備え大作戦～
description: An educational earthquake disaster safety video for kids.

name_japanese: サル太郎はとびださない！
description: An anime teaching rules for pedestrians and bicycles.

name_japanese: さすらいのバイオリン
description:
A Minna no Uta music video meant to illustrate variation of the violin. From the American cowboy fiddle to the South American tango to Japanese enka.

The music video was aired for 2 years before becoming lost media. In 2014 the Minna no Uta Hakkutsu Project  (Minna no Uta Excavation Project) was able to find discover a copy and the music video was saved and re-aired once again after 41 years.

name_japanese: さすらいゾウさん
description: Short film by Yoriko Mizushiri.

name_japanese: さすらいくん
description: Based on the gag manga by Fujio A Fujiko.

name_japanese: さとうきび畑
description: An educational film about the Sugarcane Field song composed by Naohiko Terashima in honor of the fallen soldiers at the Battle of Okinawa. The song is a ballad focusing on a girl who does not know her father has died in battle and goes to search for him in the sugarcane fields wondering why people go to war and if it was all worth the risk.

name_japanese: サッと安心、SAT x Peeping Life
studios: CoMix Wave Films, FOREST Hunting One
description: SAT (Union Forest Company's Security division) and Peeping Life collaboration.

name_japanese: 沢井製薬株式会社 CMs
description:
Sawai Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd commissioned commercials. This entry includes:

"Jouhouteikyou ni Tsuite" an informative piece about how the company information provision. 

"Okusuri Nomeru ka na?" a musical video for mothers and children. It tries to help facilitate children to taking their medicine through a happy song with other animals. It was created in conjunction with tricks and psychology from the Osaka Maternal and Childcare Center as well as the Japan Acoustic Laboratory.

name_japanese: さわって！ぐでたま 〜3どめのしょうじき〜
description: Advertisements for the Gudetama tap app Sawatte! Gudetama: 3-dome no Shoujiki. The videos are aired on television and streamed on Sanrio's official YouTube channel and typically have a gaming theme.

name_japanese: サヨナラのかわりに2013
description: Official music video for idol group Oha Girl Chu! Chu! Chu!'s song Sayonara no Kawari ni 2013. It is a cover of a song titled Sayonara no Kawari ni performed by the idol group Oha Ska in 2000 by the 1999 cast of Oha Suta, a Japanese children's TV show. Both idol groups are owned by the Oha Suta franchise.

name_japanese: さよなら柔軟剤
description: Official music video for Enya-Sang's song Sayonara Nyuunanzai from their "Dai Main Climax" album going on sale.
